sentences.en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.en: A group of actors are rehearsing a play about Joan of Arc.
sentences.cn: 一群演员正在排演一出关于圣女贞德的戏。

sentences.en: A group of riders came into view on the dirt road.
sentences.cn: 一群骑车的人出现在那条土路上。

sentences.en: A group of us are going to London.
sentences.cn: 我们有一群人要去伦敦。

sentences.en: A hard-core group of right-wing senators had hoped to sway their colleagues.
sentences.cn: 一群骨干右翼参议员曾企图左右自己的同僚。

sentences.en: A large group had gathered on the quayside to see them off.
sentences.cn: 一大群人聚集在码头上，为他们送别。

sentences.en: A small group of youths stayed behind to heckle and shout abuse.
sentences.cn: 一小群小青年没走，在起哄、叫骂。

sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: He was surrounded by a group of admirers.
sentences.cn: 他的身边围了一群仰慕者。

sentences.en: She attended a cancer support group at her local hospital.
sentences.cn: 她参加了当地医院的癌症互助组。

sentences.en: She paused as the group of children filed out of the house.
sentences.cn: 那群孩子从房子里鱼贯而出时，她停了下来。

sentences.en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentences.en: The group said it continues to hold 1,774,687 Vons shares.
sentences.cn: 该集团称其继续持有1,774,687股冯氏公司的股份。

sentences.en: The group who had been shouting offensively opened to let her through.
sentences.cn: 那群无礼叫嚷的人让开一条路让她通过。

sentences.en: The group's debut album was immediately acclaimed a hip hop classic.
sentences.cn: 这个组合的首张专辑一经推出便被盛赞为嘻哈乐的经典之作。

sentences.en: The group's problems have led to speculation that heads will roll.
sentences.cn: 已经有人猜测，该集团的问题会导致一些人被解雇。

sentences.en: The photo shows four men grouped round a jeep.
sentences.cn: 照片上是四个男人围着一辆吉普车。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

phrases.tran_cn: 控制组（自变量的一种处理方法）；实验对照组
n. 同种同文化之民族
组长；车间班长；团体领袖
利益集团（指有共同利益的一群人）
特殊群；特别小组；非凡群
学习集团，学习小组；学习研讨会

trans.tran_cn: 组，团体，集团，群，批，（雕塑等的）群像，（英美的）空军大队
trans.tran_en: several people or things that are all together in the same place
to come together and form a group, or to arrange things or people together in a group

trans.tran_cn: 集合， 聚集； 把…分类
trans.tran_en: to divide people or things into groups according to a system
